messages.title: Stop Brexit. Stop independence. Build a brighter future.
messages.content: Jo Swinson's Liberal Democrats are the only party committed to keeping Scotland in the UK and the UK in Europe. James Oates and the Lib Dems will stop Brexit, stop independence and build a better future for Gordon.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Working to keep Scotland in the UK and Europe
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dems are committed to keeping Scotland in the UK and the UK in Europe.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Education - a vital investment for the future
keyPolicies.policyDescription: On the SNP's watch, 150,000 college places have been lost, education budgets slashed. Lib Dems will give learning a boost and help create a better economy.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protecting our environment, tackling the climate crisis
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Working with the EU enables us to set high environmental standards that help protect our planet.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fighting for a fair deal for Aberdeen City & Shire
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Year after year, Aberdeen City & Shire have been ignored and underfunded by the Scottish Government. James will fight for a fair deal for the North East from the SNP Government.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Making our NHS fit for the future
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Giving our NHS the resources it needs to improve our mental health services, tackle the GP crisis and promote good health and wellbeing.

issues.education: On the SNP's watch, 150,000 college places have been lost, education budgets slashed.
issues.environment: Working with the EU enables us to set high environmental standards that help protect our planet.
issues.health: Giving our NHS the resources it needs to improve our mental health services, tackle the GP crisis and promote good health and wellbeing.

community.content: Year after year, Aberdeen City & Shire have been ignored and underfunded by the Scottish Government. James will fight for a fair deal for the North East from the SNP Government.

contactInformation.address: James Oates for Gordon Campaign Office; 49 Queen's Road, Aberdeen, AB15 4YE

images.caption: A brighter future for our country

On the SNP's watch, 150,000 college places have been lost, education budgets slashed.

Making our NHS fit for the future
Jo Swinson's Liberal Democrats are the only party committed to keeping Scotland in the UK and the UK in Europe.
Support for the Liberal Democrats in Aberdeen City & Shire has increased significantly in the last few months.
In May's European Parliament election, the Liberal Democrats surged to second place across the United Kingdom.

personalStories.story: James Oates has the experience to be a powerful voice for Gordon. A graduate of Aberdeen University, he has had a successful career in the city working for independent investment companies such as J P Morgan, Robert Fleming and UBS.
